title: 1950s American film leader
author: deltic

comments.content: Hand-drawn to me definitely as the /S are completely different some kind of naive prehistoric version of Futura. Ready-to-go alternative: [Battling](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065650/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nonpareille/battling), [Diamonds](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065650/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/diamonds), [Vinatage](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065650/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/m-b-creative/mb-vinatage)

Whoever created this was not a conventional type designer. Nothing fits together as to style. It is either the result of ignorance or a conscious effort to make a disruptive image. Which would be appropriate for a movie about the end of the world, or the Dada art movement.  
Ryuk's suggestions are good. Particularly if you pick letters and numbers at random from the three fonts and jumble them together. :)  
Don
